flavor_text: Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Un able to restrainits extreme power it races headlong around the land.
A Pokemon that races across the land. It is saidthat one is born every time a new volcano appears.
This brawny Pokemon courses around the earth spouting flames hotter than a volcano's magma.
ENTEI embodies the passion of magma. This Pokemon is thought to have been born in the eruption of a volcano.It sends up massive bursts of fire that utterly consume all that they touch.
